text: Kei Nishikori was the defending champion, but chose not to participate this year. Second-seeded Gaël Monfils won the title, defeating Ivo Karlović in the final: 5–7, 7–6(8–6), 6–4. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== The top four seeds received a bye into the qualifying competition. ===Qualifiers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Citi Open - Men's Singles 2016 Men's Singles
title: 2016 Citi Open – Men's Singles
